org.superfuntime.chatty.utils

Class BotClassInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.superfuntime.chatty.utils.BotClassInfo

  • public class BotClassInfo
extends Object
    Contains info about a loaded bot. The bot does not have to be running.
